page.title: 06A day in the life of.....
page.content: Mark Breen.Saturday,22nd.June. After I woke up,I lay in bed for a while then I got dressed.After I got washed I went downstairs to have my breakfast.Then I brushed my teeth and put on my shoes and coat to go to work with my mam.We walked to the bus and took a ride on the Metro we got off. I helped my mam do her job,that is clean my uncle's pub.Then we did the Metro and bus journey home again.As soon as we got home I took my dog for a walk and then played with him.I played my records in the house because it was raining.When it stopped I went out and played on the slide.After 6pm. I watched T.V. then played some more records and went to bed.
